# multiple

**Type Property**

The value that indicates the framework extends the selection visually inside the rectangular area defined by the anchor and dragged positions.

## Declaration

```swift
static var multiple: NSTextSelectionNavigation.Modifier { get }
```

## Discussion

This produces an [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSTextSelection] per line.

## Navigation modifier characteristics

- **extend**: The value that indicates the framework extends the selection by not moving the initial location while in a drag selection.
- **visual**: The value that indicates the framework extends the selection visually inside the rectangular area defined by the anchor and drag positions.
